text: @realDonaldTrump Stop blasting/blaming other people for your mistakes. You failed the American people cause you didn’t act quickly. What you’re doing now, liberate this state, liberate that state. Do you realize the circumstances ? Riots, hatred, etc.= increased COVD19 cases! Is that what u want?
